name: Dorke and Ymp
description: This game is a puzzle adventure platformer in which you got to help Dorke (and Ymp) to make some errands for your evil Master Wizard in exchange of him training you and teaching you his magic spells.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Dual Core Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: 256MB Additional Notes: NA
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Quad Core Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 256Mb
